thread.title: China Tycoon Back Under U.S. Scrutiny
thread.title_full: China Tycoon Back Under U.S. Scrutiny - WSJ

author: Kate O’Keeffe
title: China Tycoon Back Under U.S. Scrutiny
text:
The Chinese billionaire charged with bribing a former top United Nations official has also been linked to a campaign-finance scandal and named by Congress as a front for Communist Party cadres.
Ng Lap Seng also has been called “a human living Buddha” for his donations to disaster relief funds and children’s charities, according to a biography... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
